ProjectTitle: WISH-ROOT: Tuning the wheat root microbiome to improve soil health and optimize rhizosphere nitrogen cycling and availability
InitialFeedbackHistory:
08/09/2022
Your DMP seem to miss a few questions that FWO asks for. That is no problem now, but best to include those in the final DMP you will need to send to FWO.

Section 3 Ethical - Legal missing (may not apply, then just indicate N/A)
Q 4.1 missing: What documentation will be provided to enable understanding and reuse of the data collected/generated in this project?
This one is important - do make sure there's good documentation, protocols, readme files, variable definitions etc for the datasets you'll create.

See the FWO template here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp
label: good with suggestions
